product: BURETTES WITH BOROFLO STOPCOCK, CLASS A
description: Complies with IS 1997 / ISO 385, Accuracy as per class A. Supplied with Boroflo stopcock. No lubrication required. Calibrated & certified at 27°C and supplied with certificate of calibration traceable to National standards. Generally used in titration process.
notes: Accuracy as per ASTM E287-2 and calibrated at 20°C. 30 ml and 00 ml capacities comply with ISO and ASTM standards.
title: Untitled Group 1

product: BURETTES WITH BOROFLO STOPCOCK, CLASS B
description: Complies with IS 1997 / ISO 385, Accuracy as per class B. Supplied with Boroflo stopcock. No lubrication required. Calibrated at 27°C. Generally used in titration process.
title: Untitled Group 2

description:
• Complies with IS 7232
• Graduated from 0 to 1 ml in 0.1 ml divisions
• Graduated from 1 to 10 ml in 0.5 ml divisions
• 10 to 40 ml in 1 ml divisions also marked at 1000 ml
• Facilitates the determination of the amount of sediment in sewage or industrial waste
title: Untitled Group 3

description:
• Complies with IS 7232
• The blunt tip increases its ruggedness and cleaning ease
• Ideal for use with heavy sediments where the ability to read small volumes is unimportant
• Facilitates the determination of the amount of sediment in sewage or industrial waste
title: Untitled Group 4

product: CYLINDERS, Class A, Hexagonal base, Pour out
description:
• Complies with IS 878, ISO 4788 with ISI Mark
• Graduated, Single Metric Scale
• Each cylinder is engraved with a unique serial number, and calibration traceable to national standards
• Graduations in amber enamel
• Sturdy hexagonal base prevents roll-over and ensures greater stability
• Calibrated and certified at 27°C

product: CYLINDERS, Class B, Hexagonal base, Pour out
description:

product: DESICCATOR SET With Cover & Porcelain Plate
description:
• Complies with IS 6128
• Supplied with cover and porcelain plate, plastic knob
• Simple design for drying under atmospheric pressure
• Ground glass flanges
• Plates are positioned on an internal ledge within the base
• Generally used for drying of moist products, and for storage of moisture sensitive substances

product: VACUUM DESICCATOR SET With Cover & Porcelain Plate
description:

• Simple design for drying under atmospheric pressure
• Ground glass flanges
• Plates are positioned on an internal hedge within the base
• Designed for use under vacuum
• Generally used for drying of moist products, and for storage of substances
title: Untitled Group 8

description:
• Reinforced and fire-polished rims reduce chipping
• Large labelling field for easy marking
• Very high resistance to chemicals and thermal shocks
• Ideal for crystallization and in hot/ice baths
title: Untitled Group 9

description:
• Made of 3.3 low expansion borosilicate glass
• Complies with IS 2626
• These dishes are clear and withstand repeated sterilisation cycles
• Beaded edges impart greater mechanical strength
• Specially formed to ensure even wall thickness and consistent optical performance
• Ideal culture vessel for microbiology and plant tissue culture applications

description:

• S-Line petri dishes with durable white enamel printing
• Helps in quick identification of the lid and the bottom
• Optimally clear and bubble free for making critical observations
• Flat inner surface for uniform distribution of media
• Ideal culture vessel for microbiology and plant tissue culture applications

description: Distilling flask with I/C joint 19/26 as per ASTM D86

title: Untitled Group 19
Short Stem
description: Complies with IS 1591 DIN / ISO 4798. Designed with a 60° bowl angle to ensure precise fitting of the filter paper. High thermal shock resistance and chemical resistance. Generally used for filtering and decanting liquids of varied densities.

title: With Stem
description: Designed with a short wide stem to facilitate smooth flow. Ideal for transferring powders.

title: Stem With Cone
description: Supplied with ground glass cone for easy fitting on flask. Interchangeable joint size 24/29. Designed with a short wide stem to facilitate smooth flow. Ideal for transferring powders.

title: Class B, White Marking
description: Complies with ISO 835. Graduated for delivery from zero mark to the last graduation mark. Graduation in white enamel for increased visibility against dark solutions. Calibrated at 27°C.

title: Class A, With Individual Calibration Certificate
description: Complies with IS, ISO 835, Type III total delivery. These Pipettes are graduated to the tip. Two rings at the top indicate that the Pipette is calibrated to deliver from any graduation line down to tip. Supplied with individual calibration certificate showing actual volume dispensed and providing traceable standards. Markings are made in permanent amber stain diffused into the surface of the glass for better visibility. Calibrated and certified at 27°C.

title: Class B, White Marking
description: Complies with IS, ISO 835. These Pipettes are graduated to the tip. Two rings at the top indicate that the Pipette is calibrated to deliver from any graduation line down to tip. Graduation in white enamel for increased visibility against dark solutions. Calibrated at 27°C.

title: Class A, with Individual Calibration Certificate
description: Complies with IS 1117 / ISO 648 with ISI Mark. Calibrated for delivery (TD, Ex). Each pipette coded with unique identification number (UID) and supplied with calibration certificate with traceable standards. Generally used for accurate measurement and decanting of liquid. Calibrated and certified at 27°C.

title: Class B
description: Complies with IS 1117 / ISO 648 with ISI Mark. Calibrated for delivery (TD, Ex). Generally used for accurate measurement and decanting of liquid. Calibrated at 27°C.

title: With Rim
description: Complies with IS 2618, DIN / ISO 4142. Designed with a round bottom and a rim. Made thick-walled, mechanically very resistant. High thermal shock resistance.

title: Untitled Group 29
description: Designed with a round bottom. Thick walled and high mechanical resistance. High thermal shock resistance. Used for blood and microbial culturing.

title: Without Rim
description: Complies with IS 2618, DIN / ISO 4142. Designed with a round bottom and without rim. Made thick-walled, mechanically very resistant. High thermal shock resistance.

title: Untitled Group 31
description: Designed with a round bottom. Thick walled and high mechanical resistance. High thermal shock resistance. Used for blood and microbial culturing.

title: Without Rim
description: Complies with IS 2618, DIN / ISO 4142. Designed with a round bottom and without rim. Made thick-walled, mechanically very resistant. High thermal shock resistance.

title: Without Rim
description: Designed with flat bottom and without rim. High thermal shock resistance. Used for pathological tests and disintegration apparatus.

title: S-Line
description: Made of soda lime glass. Absolutely flat curved surface. High clarity, bubble-free. All glasses molded to the same radius for stacking.

title: With Sintered Disc
description: Made of 3.3 borosilicate glass. Especially useful where filter paper may be attacked. Used in qualitative inorganic analysis and preparation. Resistant to corrosion and heat.

title: Low Form, With Sintered Disc
description: Made of 3.3 borosilicate glass. Adapted for analytical work where precipitates are dried to constant weight at 110°C. Should not be subjected to sudden temperature changes. Remove from furnace only after cooling to 250°C.

title: Untitled Group 37
description: Made of 3.3 borosilicate glass. Suitable for use with Borosil’s Scientific Gooch Crucible with sintered disc.

title: Without Spout
description: Complies with IS 2619 / ISO 3819 and DIN 12331. Graduated to indicate the approximate content. Uniform wall thickness distribution improves mechanical & thermal properties & makes it ideal for heating liquids. The easy-to-read scale and large labelling field makes marking easier. High resistance to chemical attack. Ideal for titrations.

title: Narrow Mouth With I/C Glass Stopper
description: Complies with IS 1388 (Part II) ISO 4796-2. Supplied with solid glass stopper. Printed with graduations using durable white enamel. Bottles are mechanically strong, chemical resistant, with a sturdy ground neck.

title: Narrow Mouth With Screw Cap
description: Complies with IS 1388 (Part I) ISO 4796-1. Supplied with screw caps and pouring ring made of polypropylene, autoclavable at 121°C. Printed with graduations and retrace code using durable white enamel. GL 45 thread from 100 ml to 20000 ml. Mechanically strong and chemical resistant. Ideal for storage of chemicals, reagents, and media.

title: Narrow Mouth With I/C Glass Stopper, Amber
description: Complies with IS 1388 (Part II), ISO 4796-2. Supplied with solid glass stopper. Printed with graduations using durable white enamel. Mechanically strong and chemical resistant. Uniform amber color protects media from light radiation between 300–500 nm. Ideal for light-sensitive media and long-term storage.

title: Narrow Mouth With Screw Cap, Amber
description: Complies with IS 1388 (Part I), ISO 4796-1. Supplied with screw caps and pouring ring made of polypropylene, autoclavable at 121°C. Printed with graduations and retrace code using durable white enamel. GL 45 thread from 100 ml to 20000 ml. Mechanically strong and chemical resistant. Amber color protects against light (300–500 nm). Ideal for light-sensitive media and long-term storage.

title: With I/C PTFE Stopper With Class A Certificate
description: Supplied with interchangeable PTFE (Teflon) stopper. Mechanically strong and chemical resistant. All sizes have a durable matt-finished enamelled area for marking. Supplied with certificate.

title: With I/C PTFE Stopper
description: Supplied with I/C PTFE (Teflon) stopper. Complies with IS 5717, DIN / ISO 3507. Mechanically strong and chemical resistant. Durable matt-finished enamelled marking area.

title: With Thermometer And Capillary Side Tube
description: Complies with IS 5717, DIN / ISO 3507. Mechanically strong and chemical resistant. Matt-finished enamelled area for marking. Supplied with thermometer and side tube.
